SERVERNAME: Welcome on the BAM Community Server
sServerTab0: Please join our Discord for more information and support
You can find vanilla vehicle on the map an sell them at the Safezonetrader.
Modded vehicles can only be bought at the Safezonetrader.
Using vehicles is at your own risk.
Vehicle will despawn after two days. You have to cover them with a Camo Net to stop the despawning progress.
You are not allowed to destroy other players vehicles or remove the carcover.
You are not allowed to park vehicles in the safezone. Stop and shop is allowed
sServerTab1: Please join our Discord for more information and support
You are not allowed to build closer than 1000m to a trader (Black Market and Safezone Trader).
You are not allowed to build closer than 400m to a Military Zone.
You are not allowed to build inside of Hospitals and Police Stations.
Your base must be raidable with the raiding tools available on the Server.
Gates have to be at least one vanilla fence length apart.
You are not allowed to build more than two Watchtowers on top of each other.
If your base generates too much lag, an admin will enforce a buildstop or delete parts as they deem fit.
You have to build a flagpole to start placing Items.
You have to raise your flag every 7 days or your base will eventually despawn.
sServerTab2: Please join our Discord for more information and support
You are allowed to playerboost, i.e. climb on top of other players.
You are allowed to use one item or vehicle. It is not allowed to stack items.
You are not allowed to use glitches of any kind.
You are not allowed to replace codelocks.
You are not allowed to destroy foreign bases. Take only what you need. Dropping foreign items on the ground to make them despawn, i.e. griefing, will get you banned.
You are only allowed to take over a base after you raided the flagpole and removed every single codelock.
You are not allowed to destroy or despawn other players' parked cars. (shooting/removing car cover)
You are not allowed to log off inside a foreign base.
If you login inside a foreign base, contact an admin.
